description: This file defines an interface IUserSettings and its nested INotification interface for user settings notifications such as audio description, language preferences, accessibility features, and visual settings in a media application. It serves as a stub to satisfy build dependencies and provides method signatures for getting, setting, and registering notifications related to user preferences.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: Interface for accessing and modifying user settings, including registration of notification callbacks.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Notification interface for receiving updates when user settings change, such as language, captions, and accessibility features.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Register a notification callback to receive user settings change events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregister a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidance
methods.description: Retrieve the current state of voice guidance feature.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieve whether audio description is enabled.

methods.name: GetHighContrast
methods.description: Check if high contrast mode is active.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceRate
methods.description: Get the current rate of voice guidance.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceHints
methods.description: Check if voice guidance hints are enabled.

methods.name: GetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Get the current presentation language setting.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceRate
methods.description: Set the rate of voice guidance playback.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceHints
methods.description: Enable or disable voice guidance hints.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^        struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/

ctags.name: IUserSettings
ctags.pattern: /^    struct EXTERNAL IUserSettings : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
